Thunder_Kick.display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Storm_Kick.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Storm Kick boosts the Tanker's defense against melee, ranged and area of effect damage slightly for a short period of time after hitting their foe. This bonus defense doesn't stack with itself and is unenhanceable. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Storm_Kick.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Self +Defense(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

Cobra_Strike.display_help: Using intense martial arts focus, you can perform a Cobra Strike that deals high damage, but has a great chance of Disorienting your target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Warriors_Provocation.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Crane_Kick.display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals slightly more damage than Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

Focus_Chi.display_help: Tapping into your inner Chi greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner chi with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_help: You can perform a Crippling Axe Kick that deals superior smashing damage, reduces the targets defense, may Immobilize, and Slowing their run speed. Crippling Axe Kick may also knock some flying entities out of the sky. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_target_help: The Crippling Axe Kick has crippled you, reducing your defense. You are immobilized and your Running speed will be reduced once you can move again.

Eagles_Claw.display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. After using Eagle's Claw your damage will be increased for a brief moment allowing the next attack or two to cause additional damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Eagles_Claw.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +DMG(All)
